title: LoL doesn't work!!!
body:
Hey everyone,
I downloaded LoL from the internet but when I try to open it, I see the LoL logo but it never goes to the patcher (where you have to patch, with the play-button). Does someone know how to fix it?
I've removed and  re-downloaded it a couple of times, I've tried to run it as administrator and I've also tried to run it in compatibility mode for windows 7 and windows XP. (I have windows 7 atm)
hhhurb

replies.body: Your issue might be due to a permissions issue that is blocking your OS from accessing game files and loading the patcher.  The Permissions guide Rineyy provided should help get this fixed for good.  Please let me know if your issue persists or have any questions!

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) Proceed to the steps you haven't yet performed. 

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg
